sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./BigCategories.css"; import { Col, Row, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaFish, FaPizzaSlice } from "react-icons/fa"; import { GiChickenOven } from "react-icons/gi"; import { TbCheese } from "react-icons/tb"; const BigCategories = ({ colorWines, typeWines, grapeWines }) => { return (
• Big Categories

- Wine would you pair with :

1. Red Meat{" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

2. White Meat  {" "} {" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

3. Fish   {" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

4. Cheece  {" "} {" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

5. Pasta{" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

6. Pizza  {" "} {" "}

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

); }; export default BigCategories;
